mapper.select: select gno, gname, gf.tno, price, intro, balance, pics, unit, qperied, weight, descr, tname from goodsInfo gf inner join goodsType gt on gf.tno = gt.tno where gno=#{_parameter}
select gno, gname, price, unit, weight, pics from goodsInfo where tno=#{tno} order by gno desc limit #{page}, #{rows}
select gno,gname,pics,price,tno,unit,weight from goodsInfo gf1 where 3 > (select count(gno) from goodsInfo gf2 where gf1.tno=gf2.tno and gf2.gno>gf1.gno) order by gf1.tno asc,gf1.gno asc

update.foreach: update goodsInfo set balance=balance-(select num from cartInfo where cno=#{item}) where gno = (select gno from cartInfo where cno=#{item});
